channel.title: Admin sidebar interface
channel.description:
hey guys,
i've made it so that the clan chat does not show for anyone but admins, but now i need to create contents for the sidebarinterface and i don't really get how to do this... so could you help or guide me in the right direction...
setSidebarInterface(7, -1); // clan chat if (playerRights >= 1){ setSidebarInterface(7, 904); // clan chat into ancients }
that's what i've got at the minute (I don't want the ancients screen i would like to create a custom side bar interface where i can make commands (eg. ban button, comes up with a typing screen where you enter player to ban))
Thanks, james
Bump..

item.title: Admin sidebar interface
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

hey guys,

i’ve made it so that the clan chat does not show for anyone but admins, but now i need to create contents for the sidebarinterface and i don’t really get how to do this… so could you help or guide me in the right direction…

setSidebarInterface(7, -1); // clan chat
if (playerRights >= 1){
setSidebarInterface(7, 904); // clan chat into ancients
}

that’s what i’ve got at the minute (I don’t want the ancients screen i would like to create a custom side bar interface where i can make commands (eg. ban button, comes up with a typing screen where you enter player to ban))

Thanks, james

Bump…
